scripts.compileClean: yarn clean && yarn && yarn linkDependencies && yarn compile
scripts.clean: if [ -d node_modules ]; then rm -rf node_modules; fi && npx lerna run clean
scripts.cleanDependencies: rm -r node_modules && npx lerna run cleanDependencies
scripts.versionPatch: ./scripts/update-euglena-deps.js patch &&  git add ./**/package.json  && git commit -m 'Update euglena related dependencies' && npx lerna version patch --force-publish -y
scripts.versionMinor: ./scripts/update-euglena-deps.js minor &&  git add ./**/package.json  && git commit -m 'Update euglena related dependencies' && npx lerna version minor --force-publish -y
scripts.versionMajor: ./scripts/update-euglena-deps.js major &&  git add ./**/package.json  && git commit -m 'Update euglena related dependencies' && npx lerna version major --force-publish -y
